Sounds good!

Shin and Daichi always had trouble keeping their place clean. Most of it was from laziness, as they'd rather spend time hosting parties and such.

So when Daichi brought up the idea of finding a maid, Shin couldn't get the idea out of his mind. The two didn't plan ahead very much, but decided to kidnap the first cute guy they saw walking alone at night.

Not only did they find a cute guy, but a cute pair of twins. They acted accordingly, running out of their car to snatch the two. Tying them up with rope and gagging them with a cloth, they shoved them into the trunk before driving off.

When they got back to their house, they retrieved the new maids from the trunk, carrying them through the door and shoving them onto the couch.

"Good thing we bought two outfits, huh?" Shin says as he smirks down at them, grabbing onto two latex maid outfits from the nearby table.

Choro and Totty had been enjoying a perfectly ordinary day before they’d been kidnapped - planning to stop at the grocery store at some point before making their way back home where the rest of their brothers were lounging around. 

Matsus weren’t the type to be kidnapped and gagged, spilled out onto their captor’s couch and leered down at like they are now. 

Muffled protests make their way through each gag at the statement, two sets of eyes also landing on the latex outfits.

Daichi and Shin ignore their protests as they snip away the captives' clothes, handling them rather roughly as they pinch and pull at their nipples.

Daichi holds onto Choro as the more extravagant maid outfit is forced on him, lots of frills and ribbons attached to the latex. The outfit's top ends at the nipples, almost like a corset.

"You don't really strike me as the maid type..." Shin says, looking up his skirt to poke at his cock. "So I think we'll just use you as a sex doll."
